name: Transcendent Crystals
text: Can be used from turn 3 and onward by sending 1-3 cards from your hand to the Graveyard. Choose the same number of "Crystal Beast" monsters from your Deck as the number of cards you sent from your hand to the Graveyard, and place it/them in your Spell & Trap Zone. If you begin the Duel with a Deck that has 7 or more "Crystal Beast" monsters, you can use this Skill regardless of the current turn. This Skill can only be used once per turn and twice per Duel.
